s.l: As the ocean waves come to the stony beach,
our minutes are rushing to their outcome as well,
Every alternating place with it that goes before,
the following plagues are looking forward to fight.
Birth of Christ was once the main focus,
crawling to adulthood, where it'll be crowned.
Unhonest darkness against his glory fight,
and what was given once by time confuses it.
Time freezes the elegant set of youth,
and deepens the similarities in beauty's top:
Uses the valuable truth of nature,
and nothing is left but for his weapon to slaughter destroy.
And in these lines my verse should survive,
showing off your worth, even after our time.
